faq.question: Quoi's the difference between IA upscaling and regular upscaling?
faq.answer: Regular upscaling (interpolation) just stretches pixels. IA upscaling uses neural networks to intelligently generate new detIAl that looks natural and sharp.

faq.question: Can I Agrandir Images beyond 4x on Gratuit tier?
faq.answer: The Gratuit tier Supports up to 4x upscaling. pour 8x upscaling and larger outputs, upgrade to a premium plan.

faq.question: Comment long does IA upscaling take?
faq.answer: Typiquement 30-60 seconds pour Standard Images on the Gratuit tier. Premium users get priority Traitement in 10-20 seconds.

faq.question: Is this really unlimited and Gratuit?
faq.answer: Yes! Because the IA runs in your browser, there are no server costs per Image. Use it as much as you want avec no limits, no signup, and no watermarks.

faq.question: Pourquoi is it Gratuit Quand others charge?
faq.answer: Traditional background removers process Images on their servers, which costs money. Our tool uses WebAssembly to run the IA model directly in your browser, eliminating server costs.

faq.question: Are my Images private?
faq.answer: Completely. Your Images are processed locally on your device and never uploaded anyOù. We cannot see or access your Images.

faq.question: Quoi browsers are Supported?
faq.answer: Any modern browser avec WebAssembly Support works: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Mobile browsers are Supported but may be slower on older devices.
